summary.description:
Today, cooler for the outside temperature (down 3.0°C) and feels like temperature (down 2.9°C) and more moisture-laden outside humidity (up 8%) and rainfall (up 0.1 mm).

Compared to today, yesterday also had noticeable differences in cloud levels (up 632 m).

The past week and month had observable variation in cloud levels (up 1582 m), light levels (up 3494 lux), and rainfall (down 0.1 mm) when compared to today.

Yesterday, cloud levels hit a low of 1059m and a high of 3380m, averaging 1091.9m; the past week and month reported somewhat higher averages.
cloud levels.summary: The sky may alternate between sunny and overcast.

summary.summary: Inside; anticipate mild and comfortable temperatures. Outside; temperatures should feel nicely warm. Also, the air will be thick and uncomfortable and winds will be practically absent. Some rain can be expected, the sky may alternate between sunny and overcast, and a mix of sun and clouds. Changeable conditions.
